A story about a dog that was trained to not bark, but when faced with a life-threatening situation, it was unable to resist and barked to save its owner.
A poem that explores the idea of loyalty and the lengths a dog would go to protect its family.
A play that delves into the emotional journey of a dog that has been trained to not bark, and the consequences of that training.
A film that portrays the relationship between a dog and its owner, and the importance of communication and trust in their bond.
A short story thatizes the idea of a dog that has been trained to not bark, but when it hears its owner's voice, it barks with joy and excitement.
